# What is Chaptr?

Chaptr (formerly ChapterChat), is your digital collection for beloved reads. This creative platform empowers you to effortlessly curate a personalized virtual bookshelf, a testament to your literary journey. Simply record the details of each book you've read â€“ **Title, Author, Description, Genre, Rating** (out of 5 stars), and a **Cover Image**. As your collection grows, ChapterChat becomes more than just a list of reviews; it transforms into a living archive of your literary history, allowing for a space to revisit past favorites, or share any critiques about a certain title.

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/97495088/518286555-7944351b-61e8-434d-9dad-cb273433506f.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..UpsthYm5vWeRummSrRBbbcgvYw8koPKoB-o-z0UEJyM)

<br/>

# What information can I include about a book?

Books you review can contain information fields such as Title, Author, Review Description, Genre, Star rating out of 5, and a cover that is applied for you automatically once inputting a title and author.

Books can then be sorted in your shelf by their values such as rating, date added, new, recently updated, etc.

<br/>

# How can I add a book to my shelf?

Once you've signed up for an account or signed into your existing account, simply click on the **'+'** in the top left of your bookshelf to get started.

![image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/97495088/518288439-f7fcbb93-253d-4a7e-9920-98091c16419f.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..UKuxWvqYEtt0sLCFPG5CfwNpsKhYCKC-64I4VMpnoCI)

# What extra features will be added soon?

<br/>

## Social Portal

In the future, it is planned that Chaptr may feature a social aspect. Having a social aspect will allow users to share and visit reads of people they wish to follow.

<p align="center">
  <img src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/53808f75-86e1-4464-8fb9-b1c907ec37a5" />
</p>

## Better Resources

Right now, Chaptr is still a small platform. With the right investment of time for development and money, Chaptr can grow and have greater storage capabilities, faster load times, better quality images for covers, better quality of the site, potential for a mobile app, and more features.

  <img src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5d863706-9327-41bd-8548-5f90af52599b" />

## Other features

For any other desired features or to let me know about any bugs within the application. A support form located in the footer of the site will be soon introduced, allowing for direct support communications. Please do not shy away from reporting bugs or proposing new features, any and all feedback helps the platform provide a greater experience..
